data.title: Member Institutions
data.meta_description: The official website for Alpha Chi National College Honor Society.
data.text:
Alpha Chi has chapters on some 300 college and university campuses across the United States. In order by college name, this listing shows each chapter’s official name and region. Alpha Chi chapters are divided into seven geographic regions.

Region I: West Texas, Oklahoma Panhandle, and New Mexico

Region II: East Texas, Oklahoma, Arkansas, and Louisiana

Region III: Southeast, Middle Atlantic, and Puerto Rico

Region IV: Northern Plains

Region V: Eastern Midwest

Region VI: Northeast

Region VII: West

Chapter advisor contact information can be requested from office@alphachihonor.org.
